```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../"))
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
vot <- read_csv("./vot/ChodroffGoldenWilson2019_vot_avg.csv")
```

```{r}
vot %>%
  spread(poa.broad, vot.mu) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~coronal, y = ~dorsal, z = ~labial, type = "scatter3d", size = 1, color = ~vot.category)
```

```{r}
vot %>%
  mutate(
    vot.category = factor(vot.category, levels = c("lead", "short.lag", "long.lag")),
    poa.broad = factor(poa.broad, levels = c("dorsal", "coronal", "labial"))
    ) %>%
  unite("lang", language, dialect) %>%
  ggplot(aes(poa.broad, vot.mu, group = lang)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_grid(~ vot.category)
```
